attributes.action: make 023 the dialling code for all of Hampshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 023 is the dialling code for Southampton and Portsmouth along with other towns formerly in the 01703 and 01705 dialling codes such as Eastleigh, Totton, Gosport, and Havant. Please extend 023 to become the dialling code for all of Hampshire with 8 figure local numbers.
